physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a group of dacoits. There are five men in the photograph
 seated in two rows. All of them have their hair tied in a bun
 and are dressed in a loose pair of shorts tied around the waist. They are all gazing to the right of the photograph. There is a window with bars behind the group. The man on the extreme right is marked with an \u0027X\u0027 below him. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Dacoits, Col: Hamilton's Murderers, 1875, Rangoon

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a group of dacoits. There are five men in the photograph, seated in two rows. All of them have their hair tied in a bun, and are dressed in a loose pair of shorts tied around the waist. They are all gazing to the right of the photograph. There is a window with bars behind the group. The man on the extreme right is marked with an 'X' below him. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
